subject: GREG IS HERE!!!!!!!
body:
I spoke to him and he is here and well. He can be reached at 713-345-9592 or greg.phillips@enron.com. He says "Hello".
I love you. Mark McConnell
Transwestern Pipeline Company

713-822-4862 cell

subject: RE: I AM THANKFUL FOR ......
body: Why are you so cranky? Anything I can do? Hey I spoke to my friend (mike) and told him about you and Jon - you know all the good stuff, how nice you guys are, what good friends we have become, that you all live in Greatwood (like they do), that you guys have a 2 year old son (like they do), that your families are all up North (like thiers are) and he want the six of us to have dinner so he and his wife can get to know you and JOn ...Interested?

subject: RE: FW: Nostradamus' prediction on WW3..................
body: he did not. but he did predict your homosexual preoccupations.

subject: RE: singles
body:
Cindy
I think I may have just committed (by omission) my first (and may be only for this season's) fatal error - I forgot to get ranked and have never been ranked before. I don't know the rules but I would assume until I get ranked I wouldn't be able to play. I will try to get ranked ASAP but in the meanwhile.... do you know what the rules require. I am so sorry if this is causing any problems. Thanks
Elizabeth Sager
713-853-6349

subject: ECA 20000907
body: Dave, Could you send me a hard copy of the transactions in question. I tried to pull them up on the website but i guess it doesn't keep records that far back. Larry 1-800-349-5527
